thread.title: Reliance announces Jio Prime membership at Rs 99
thread.title_full: Reliance announces Jio Prime membership at Rs 99

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Reliance announces Jio Prime membership at Rs 99
text:
Users who wish to enrol for the Jio prime service will have to pay Rs 99 on company’s official website before March 31st. Mukesh Ambani lead Reliance Jio has introduced its Jio Prime services for existing and new users under which users can avail unlimited 4G data and other Jio apps like TV, Movies, Music etc. for 1 year.
The offer will be active for users who enrol until March 31st, 2017. This Jio Prime membership is exclusive to the 10 Million initial Jio users and those who join Jio before 31st, March 2017. Users who wish to enrol for the Jio prime service will have to pay Rs 99 on company’s official website before March 31st.
The Rs 99 fee is the enrolment fee which will be for one year, apart from that users will have to pay Rs 303 for the next 12 months to avail unlimited 4G data, voice calls and access to Jio Apps.
To recall, Reliance Jio reached the 100 million subscriber count in the span of 170 days. During this time, users managed to consume about 100 crore GB of data. The company kicked off its services with an introductory offer which offered unlimited 4G data and 4G LTE calls for users who took Jio SIM, later the company has extended it until March 31st under Happy New Year Offer.
